trans-unit.source: Represents the dynamic binding and a binding logic of an object participating in the dynamic binding.

For more information, see documentation on the [CodePlex](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141028) Web site and the MSDN article [Implementing Dynamic Interfaces](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=198161).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> class.
The expression representing this <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> during the dynamic binding process.
The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> class.
The expression representing this <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> during the dynamic binding process.
The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.
The runtime value represented by the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref>.
Performs the binding of the dynamic binary operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.BinaryOperationBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the right hand side of the binary operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic conversion operation.
In Visual Basic, only explicit conversion is supported.
If you override this method, it is called by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Conversion.CTypeDynamic%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Conversion.CTypeDynamic%2A> functions.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.ConvertBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic create instance operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.CreateInstanceBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An array of <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> instances - arguments to the create instance operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic delete index operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DeleteIndexBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An array of <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> instances - indexes for the delete index operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic delete member operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DeleteMemberBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic get index operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.GetIndexBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An array of <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> instances - indexes for the get index operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic get member operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.GetMemberBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.InvokeBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An array of <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> instances - arguments to the invoke operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke member operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.InvokeMemberBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An array of <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> instances - arguments to the invoke member operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic set index operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.SetIndexBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
An array of <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> instances - indexes for the set index operation.
The <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the value for the set index operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic set member operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.SetMemberBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
The <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the value for the set member operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Performs the binding of the dynamic unary operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.UnaryOperationBinder"></xref> that represents the details of the dynamic operation.
The new <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> representing the result of the binding.
Creates a meta-object for the specified object.
The object to get a meta-object for.
The expression representing this <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> during the dynamic binding process.

If the given object implements <xref href="System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider"></xref> and is not a remote object from outside the current AppDomain, returns the object's specific meta-object returned by <xref href="System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider.GetMetaObject(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)"></xref>.
Otherwise a plain new meta-object with no restrictions is created and returned.
Represents an empty array of type <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref>.
This field is read only.
The expression representing the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> during the dynamic binding process.
The expression representing the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> during the dynamic binding process.
Returns the enumeration of all dynamic member names.
The list of dynamic member names.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> has the runtime value.
True if the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> has the runtime value, otherwise false.
Gets the limit type of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref>.
Represents the most specific type known about the object represented by the <xref:System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject>.
<xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject.RuntimeType"></xref> if runtime value is available, a type of the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject.Expression"></xref> otherwise.
The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.
The set of binding restrictions.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the runtime value or null if the <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref> has no value associated with it.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the runtime value or null.
The runtime value represented by this <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref>.
The runtime value represented by this <xref href="System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject"></xref>.
